project.name: Article Pipeline
project.description: A simple multi-agent pipeline to draft, edit, and publish an article.

agents.name: WriterAgent
agents.goal: Draft an article on a given topic

agents.name: EditorAgent
agents.goal: Review the article for errors and improve style

agents.name: PublisherAgent
agents.goal: Publish the final article and save the result

steps.task: Write an article about the benefits of sleep in Markdown. End your reply with the marker '###OUTPUT###' and repeat the final draft after it.
Edit the draft: fix errors, improve clarity and style, keep Markdown formatting. End your reply with '###OUTPUT###' and put the improved version after it.
Convert the final Markdown into plain text (no Markdown). End your reply with '###OUTPUT###' and put the final plain text after it.
steps.expected_output: Plain text ready to save as article.txt

artifacts.description: Final plain-text version of the article
